title: I think i was just hacked in a ranked game, how do I report this?
body:
My last match, someone dcd me.  And this never happens to me at all, in any of my games. 

Someone legit just cut me off, and I couldn't even use my internet for awhile or anything until the game was over.  How do i report this?

replies.body: That's heckin' crazy if someone was able to reach our servers to disconnect you from them, especially so that your own internet didn't work at all afterwards either. It's possible that this was some kind of coincidence, maybe due to an outage in your ISP's service momentarily, but let's be sure to troubleshoot some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure we cover all your bases.
